description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Elisha Lee 1913 July 22 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photo shows Elisha Lee (1870-1933) who was Vice President of the Pennsylvania Railroad and later Chairman of the Managers Committee of the Railroads. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2009) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.13732 Call Number: LC-B2- 2774-8

note._content: Date inscribed here faintly, in reverse, is 7/22/13.
note.author: 70251312@N00
